Sentencas: TiB2, TiC reinforced Fe matrix porous cermets were produced through the synthesis reaction of Ti, C and FeB powders with 30% sintered porosity.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction analysis confirmed the completion of reaction.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: The TiB2, TiC and Fe were detected by X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: The formation of secondary reaction products was inhibited during the reactive sintering.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: Porous cermets showed large and small pores in their structure.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: Maximum bending strength of 163 MPa was obtained with 30% sintered porosity.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets

Sentencas: Furthermore, the fabricated samples were found to possess reasonable electrical conductivities, thus rendering them suitable for use as the basic components of planar solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Reactive sintering and properties of TiB2 and TiC porous cermets
